Entries.Gunther: Many thanks! This is just what I needed./226 104/Excellent! This will certainly come in handy./106 123 124 125 107 108 115 119 120 121 122 96 97 98 99 -2 -12/Well, I'm not a fan, but thanks anyway./78 110/This is unpleasant.//Thanks!/-4/
Entries.Marlon: Ah, maybe I can be bribed with gifts after all!/125 222/Thank you. This is most appreciated/109 -2/Well, I suppose the slimes might like it./-23 78/I'm not here to take your junk, kid./796/Thanks kid!//

Entries.fall_Wed: You've met my nephew, Denver, right? Yeh, I know he's surly and all that. But his bark's worse than his bite. Trust me on that one.#$b#He's a good boy, he really is.

Entries.fall_Thu: Denver's quite skilled with the sword. The kid's loyal, and doggedly determined. Might let him sink his teeth into a night patrol soon.
Entries.winter_Thu: He's a good boy, Denver. I promised my sister I'd keep an eye on him. Yep, that's right kid, I've got a sister.#$b#She took up the city life, but Denver, well I guess the wilderness called to him.
Entries.summer_Sat: I found an old demo tape the other day - you know Denver used to play in a band?#$b#They really weren't half bad. Kid's got quite some talent.

Entries.fall_Thu: Did you know wolves mate for life, @? Very family-driven canines.#$b#Why am I telling you this? Oh no reason.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey kid, keep an eye on Denver for me, won't you? His mom'd flay me alive if anything happened to him.#$b#I've fought plenty of monsters, and she's scarier than all of 'em combined.
Entries.summer_Sat: Ah, if Denver keeps going the way he's going, maybe I'll be able to actually retire.#$b#You've been a good influence on him, @.

Entries.spring_Wed: Marnie and I were friends once, back in school. Yeah, I was a few years older - but we Pelican Town kids had to stick together.#$b#I guess we drifted apart; it'll be good to catch up with her at the flower dance though.
Entries.winter_Sat: On these long, cold nights, I can't help but feel a bit lonely, kid. Gil's decent company - when he's awake. But it ain't the same, you know?
Entries.winter_Sun: It's a lonely life, being a monster hunter. Don't wanna settle down, get married, have kids. Leave them wondering if dad's gonna come home.#$b#Sorry, kid. On these long winter nights, the void can fill your heart with regret.#$b#There's something I should've said, once. But that ship has sailed.

Entries.spring_Wed: $1 Marl_Rumor#Tell me, @. Is there truth to the rumors of Ms Marnie and the mayor?#$b#Oh, no reason. I'm just curious.$k#$e#Spring is the time of new beginnings and fresh starts, isn't it, @? But if she's happy with Lewis, who am I to begrudge her that happiness?#$b#An old man plagued with regret that he did not speak his feelings sooner. That's who.

Changes.LogName: Adds Linus and Wizard to Ice Festival main event

Entries.winter_Fri6: You have surely noticed the abandoned house in town, @? A woman lived there once. She died in a tragic accident$2.#$b#And I have felt a presence there. It as though she has not left. And I wonder, what is it that holds her to this place?$2#$b#There is magic here, and I can sense her reluctance to let it go.$4

Entries.winter_Sat4: I heard something howling in the dark, last night. And I told myself, it was just wolves. But there was something eerie about it. Something otherworldy.$3#$b#Oh, listen to me! Spouting on this supernatural nonsense. It's these long winter nights, @. They're enough to make anyone a little superstitious.

Entries.Tue2: Gunther's nephew Charlie has moved in. He seems like an agreeable fellow.$1
